Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_JUDY>
The catering here is delicious! Really, it's what
keeps me going.

<NAME_MOB_JUDY>
Um... My lady... I brought you some tea...

<NAME_MOB_JUDY>
It's getting very late. Please see yourself out, and
we'll see you back here tomorrow.

<NAME_MOB_JUDY>
The most nerve-wracking part of my job is
serving food. If I break a dish, I'll be so dead...

<NAME_MOB_JUDY>
Our lady? Oh, she's a very nice person! ...Really,
I'm not lying!

<NAME_MOB_JUDY>
Our lady can be a bit selfish sometimes, but
deep down, she's really kind.

<NAME_MOB_JUDY>
I believe someday, our lady will change...um, I
mean...she'll continue to grow as a person!

<NAME_MOB_JUDY>
Is it me, or has our lady's face gotten softer
these days?

<NAME_MOB_JUDY>
Working for this house is so much more
enjoyable than it used to be!

<NAME_MOB_JUDY>
Okay, I'll keep working hard today. ♪
